items.title: Pressure mounts on Bolsonaro as two out of five judges find him guilty
items.description: The Brazilian ex-president is accused of plotting a coup to cling to power, which he denies.

items.title: Nepal anti-corruption protests explained
items.description: Protests in Nepal turned deadly after thousands of youngsters marched against the blocking of social media platforms.

items.title: Russian air strikes get deadlier and bigger, hitting Ukraine's very heart
items.description: Ukraine says Russia deliberately hit the main government building in Kyiv with a missile last Sunday.

items.title: Hamas claims leadership survived Israeli attack in Doha, but confirms six deaths
items.description: Meanwhile, the White House says the Israeli strike "does not advance Israel or America's goals".

items.title: Macron names ally Sébastien Lecornu as new French PM
items.description: It comes after a vote of confidence ousted François Bayrou after nine months in power.
